title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added ARM64 runners for Linux/Windows and increased memory for existing runners.
Fixed external link checker: always upload artifacts, conditionally create issues, and corrected token reference.
Updated internal link checker to use correct token.
Removed Copilot Metrics API from unavailable features list.
Clarified team hierarchy rules: moving a team removes it from previous parent.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added ARM64 runners for Linux/Windows and increased memory for existing runners.
- Fixed external link checker: always upload artifacts, conditionally create issues, and corrected token reference.
- Updated internal link checker to use correct token.
- Removed Copilot Metrics API from unavailable features list.
- Clarified team hierarchy rules: moving a team removes it from previous parent.
